AcceleratedShareRepurchasesSettlementPay.label: Accelerated Share Repurchases, Settlement (Payment) or Receipt
AcceleratedShareRepurchasesSettlementPay.description: Amount of cash receipt from (payment to) bank; or stock received from (issuance to) bank in the settlement of the accelerated share repurchase agreement.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossC.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cumulative Changes in Net Gain (Loss) from Cash Flow Hedges, Effect Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossC.description: Accumulated change, net of tax, in accumulated gains and losses from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges. Includes an entity's share of an equity investee's Increase or Decrease in deferred hedging gains or losses.

AdjustmentsNoncashItemsToReconcileNetInc.label: Adjustments, Noncash Items, to Reconcile Net Income (Loss) to Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Other (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
AdjustmentsNoncashItemsToReconcileNetInc.description: Transactions that do not result in cash inflows or outflows in the period in which they occur, but affect net income and thus are removed when calculating net cash flow from operating activities using the indirect cash flow method. This element is used when there is not a more specific and appropriate element.

AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

AociLossCashFlowHedgeCumulativeGainLossA.label: AOCI, Cash Flow Hedge, Cumulative Gain (Loss), after Tax
AociLossCashFlowHedgeCumulativeGainLossA.description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated gain (loss) on derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

BusinessAcquisitionContingentConsiderati.label: Business Acquisition, Contingent Consideration, at Fair Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionContingentConsiderati.description: Fair value, as of the acquisition date, of potential payments under the contingent consideration arrangement including cash and shares.

BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityC.label: Business Acquisition, Cost of Acquired Entity, Cash Paid (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityC.description: Amount of cash paid to acquire the entity.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashDividends.label: Cash Dividends (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
CashDividends.description: Cash dividend declared by an entity to shareholders during the period. This element includes paid and unpaid dividends declared during the period.

CashFlowHedgeGainLossReclassifiedToReven.label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
CashFlowHedgeGainLossReclassifiedToReven.description: The amount of net gains or losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified to revenues from accumulated other comprehensive income.

CashFlowHedgeGainLossToBeReclassifiedWit.label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) to be Reclassified within Twelve Months
CashFlowHedgeGainLossToBeReclassifiedWit.description: The estimated net amount of existing gains or losses on cash flow hedges at the reporting date expected to be reclassified to earnings within the next 12 months.

CommonStockSharesIssued.label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
CommonStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

CommonStockValue.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
CommonStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

ContractualMaturitiesTimeDeposits100000O.label: Contractual Maturities, Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, after 12 Months
ContractualMaturitiesTimeDeposits100000O.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more, maturing after twelve months from the balance sheet date.

ContractualMaturitiesTimeDeposits100000O.label: Contractual Maturities, Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, Three Months or Less
ContractualMaturitiesTimeDeposits100000O.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more, maturing within three months or fewer from the balance sheet date.

CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Federal Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Federal Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred federal income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

Deposits.label: Deposits
Deposits.description: The aggregate of all deposit liabilities held by the entity, including foreign and domestic, interest and noninterest bearing; may include demand deposits, saving deposits, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW) and time deposits among others.

DerivativeAssetCollateralObligationToRet.label: Derivative Asset, Collateral, Obligation to Return Cash, Offset
DerivativeAssetCollateralObligationToRet.description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements offset against derivative assets.

DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnCa.label: Derivative, Collateral, Obligation to Return Cash
DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnCa.description: Amount of obligation to return cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets.

DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimCash.label: Derivative, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
DerivativeCollateralRightToReclaimCash.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

DerivativeInstrumentsGainLossRecognizedI.label: Derivative Instruments, Gain (Loss) Recognized in Income, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
DerivativeInstrumentsGainLossRecognizedI.description: The amount of net gains and losses recognized in income during the period on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments in fair value hedges and related hedged items designated and qualifying in fair value hedges, on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments in cash flow hedges, and on derivative instruments not designated as hedging instruments.

DerivativeLiabilityCollateralRightToRecl.label: Derivative Liability, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash, Offset
DerivativeLiabilityCollateralRightToRecl.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements offset against derivative liabilities.

DividendsCash.label: Dividends, Cash
DividendsCash.description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash dividends declared for classes of stock, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred.

DividendsCommonStockCash.label: Dividends, Common Stock, Cash
DividendsCommonStockCash.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.

DividendsPreferredStock.label: Dividends, Preferred Stock
DividendsPreferredStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

DividendsPreferredStockCash.label: Dividends, Preferred Stock, Cash
DividendsPreferredStockCash.description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.description: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDedu.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Extraterritorial Income Exclusion, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDedu.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and the expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for extraterritorial income exclusion.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationFore.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationFore.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to statutory income tax expense (benefit) outside of the country of domicile.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Other, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other nondeductible expenses.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Restructuring Charges, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to restructuring charges.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationOthe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationOthe.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationPrio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Prior Year Income Taxes, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationPrio.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to revisions of previously reported income tax expense.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationStat.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationStat.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to state and local income tax expense (benefit), net of federal tax expense (benefit).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax on Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Percentage of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxE.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Exempt Income, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxE.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxS.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxS.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income tax settlements. Including, but not limited to, domestic tax settlement, foreign tax settlement, state and local tax settlement, and other tax settlements.

FederalFundsPurchased.label: Federal Funds Purchased
FederalFundsPurchased.description: Amount of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

IncomeTaxesPaid.label: Income Taxes Paid
IncomeTaxesPaid.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

IncomeTaxReceivable.label: Income Taxes Receivable
IncomeTaxReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of income taxes previously overpaid to tax authorities (such as U.S. Federal, state and local tax authorities) representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes. Also called income tax refund receivable.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Restructuring Charges, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible restructuring charges.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherReconcilingI.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Reconciling Items, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherReconcilingI.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax exempt income, equity in earnings (loss) of an unconsolidated subsidiary, minority noncontrolling interest income (loss), tax holiday, disposition of a business, disposition of an asset, repatriation of foreign earnings, repatriation of foreign earnings jobs creation act of 2004, increase (decrease) in enacted tax rate, prior year income taxes, increase (decrease) in deferred tax asset valuation allowance, and other adjustments.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherDeposits.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deposit liabilities classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Time Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDeposits.description: Net cash inflow (outflow) of time deposits.

InterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesDomesti.label: Interest-bearing Deposit Liabilities, Domestic
InterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesDomesti.description: Total amount of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities, which may include brokered, retail, demand, checking, notice of withdrawal, money market and other interest-bearing deposits.

InterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesForeign.label: Interest-bearing Deposit Liabilities, Foreign
InterestBearingDepositLiabilitiesForeign.description: Amount of foreign interest-bearing deposits held by the entity.

InterestBearingDepositsInBanks.label: Interest-bearing Deposits in Banks and Other Financial Institutions
InterestBearingDepositsInBanks.description: For banks and other depository institutions (including Federal Reserve Banks, if applicable): Interest-bearing deposits in other financial institutions for relatively short periods of time including, for example, certificates of deposits, which are presented separately from cash on the balance sheet.

InterestExpenseDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Deposits
InterestExpenseDeposits.description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all deposits.

InterestIncomeDepositsWithFinancialInsti.label: Interest Income, Deposits with Financial Institutions
InterestIncomeDepositsWithFinancialInsti.description: Interest income derived from funds deposited with both domestic and foreign financial institutions including funds in money market and other accounts.

InterestPaid.label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
InterestPaid.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

NoninterestBearingDepositLiabilities.label: Noninterest-bearing Deposit Liabilities
NoninterestBearingDepositLiabilities.description: The aggregate amount of all domestic and foreign noninterest-bearing deposits liabilities held by the entity.

NotionalAmountOfCashFlowHedgeInstruments.label: Notional Amount of Cash Flow Hedge Instruments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
NotionalAmountOfCashFlowHedgeInstruments.description: Aggregate notional amount of all derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. The notional amount relates to a number of currency units, shares, bushels, pounds, or other units specified in a derivative instrument.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItemsIncludedI.label: Other Adjustments for Noncash Items Included in Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItemsIncludedI.description: Transactions that result in no cash inflows or outflows in the period in which they occur, but affect net income and thus are removed when calculating net cash flow from operating activities using the indirect method. This element is used when there is not a more specific and appropriate element.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after reclassification, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, before tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), before reclassification adjustments, related to increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherNoncashExpense.label: Other Noncash Expense
OtherNoncashExpense.description: Amount of expense or loss included in net income that result in no cash flow, classified as other.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherShortTermBorrowings.label: Other Short-term Borrowings
OtherShortTermBorrowings.description: Amount of borrowings classified as other, maturing within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PaymentsForLegalSettlements.label: Payments for Legal Settlements
PaymentsForLegalSettlements.description: The amount of cash paid for the settlement of litigation or for other legal issues during the period.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.label: Payments for Repurchase of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock during the period.

PaymentsForRestructuring.label: Payments for Restructuring
PaymentsForRestructuring.description: Amount of cash payments made as the result of exit or disposal activities. Excludes payments associated with a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireFinanceReceivables.label: Payments to Acquire Finance Receivables
PaymentsToAcquireFinanceReceivables.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of amounts due from customers, clients, lessees, borrowers, or others under the terms of its agreements therewith.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInJoint.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Interest in Joint Venture
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInJoint.description: The cash inflow from the sale of an investment interest in a joint venture that the reporting entity has not previously accounted for using consolidation or the equity method of accounting.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfWarrants.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Warrants
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfWarrants.description: The cash inflow from issuance of rights to purchase common shares at predetermined price (usually issued together with corporate debt).

ProceedsFromPaymentsForInInterestBearing.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) in Interest-bearing Deposits in Banks
ProceedsFromPaymentsForInInterestBearing.description: The net cash inflow or outflow in Interest-bearing Deposits by banks in other financial institutions for relatively short periods of time including, for example, certificates of deposits.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

ProceedsFromSaleOfTreasuryStock.label: Proceeds from Sale of Treasury Stock
ProceedsFromSaleOfTreasuryStock.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of an equity stock that has been previously reacquired by the entity.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.label: Proceeds from Stock Options Exercised
ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.description: Amount of cash inflow from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RestructuringReserveSettledWithCash.label: Restructuring Reserve, Settled With Cash (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RestructuringReserveSettledWithCash.description: Amount of cash paid in the period to fully or partially settle a specified, previously accrued type of restructuring cost.

ShortTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.label: Short-term Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate, at Point in Time
ShortTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.description: Weighted average interest rate of short-term debt outstanding calculated at point in time.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Treasury Stock Reissued
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStoc.description: Value of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

TimeDeposits100000OrMore.label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More
TimeDeposits100000OrMore.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.

TimeDeposits100000OrMoreDomestic.label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, Domestic (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
TimeDeposits100000OrMoreDomestic.description: The aggregate amount of domestic time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more.

TimeDeposits100000OrMoreForeign.label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More, Foreign (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
TimeDeposits100000OrMoreForeign.description: The aggregate amount of foreign time deposits (including certificates of deposits, individual retirement accounts and open accounts) in denominations of $100,000 or more.

TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.label: Time Deposits, at or Above FDIC Insurance Limit
TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations that meet or exceed the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit.

TimeDepositsNoncurrent.label: Time Deposit Maturities, after Year One
TimeDepositsNoncurrent.description: Amount of time deposit maturing after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.label: Treasury Stock Acquired, Average Cost Per Share
TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.description: Total cost of shares repurchased divided by the total number of shares repurchased.

TreasuryStockNumberOfSharesHeld.label: Treasury Stock, Number of Shares Held (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
TreasuryStockNumberOfSharesHeld.description: Number of shares held for each class of treasury stock.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredParValueMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Par Value Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredParValueMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the par value method.

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received on Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.description: Cash received on stock transaction after deduction of issuance costs.

DividendsCommonStock.label: Dividends, Common Stock
DividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

TimeDeposits.label: Time Deposits
TimeDeposits.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.

InterestExpenseFederalFundsPurchased.label: Interest Expense, Federal Funds Purchased
InterestExpenseFederalFundsPurchased.description: Gross expenses on the purchase of Federal funds at a specified price with a simultaneous agreement to sell the same to the same counterparty at a fixed or determinable price at a future date.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

IncreaseDecreaseInFederalFundsPurchased.label: Increase (Decrease) in Federal Funds Purchased
IncreaseDecreaseInFederalFundsPurchased.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the fund borrowed from other financial institution arising from the insufficient reserve deposited at Federal Reserve Bank to meet legal requirement. This borrowing is usually contracted on an overnight basis at an agreed rate of interest.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMat.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Short-term Debt, Maturing in Three Months or Less
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMat.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing net of the cash outflow from repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment within three months.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.
